``` ::: ::: ::: {#6bae3c97 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} import seaborn as sns import matplotlib.pyplot as plt fig, ax = plt.subplots() sns.scatterplot(data=penguins, x="bill_length_mm", y="flipper_length_mm", hue="species", ax=ax) ax.set_title("Penguins: Bill vs Flipper Length") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ``` Text(0.5, 1.0, 'Penguins: Bill vs Flipper Length') ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-3-output-2.png){width=593 height=449} ::: ::: ::: {#4b733007 .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} fig.savefig("penguin_plot.png", dpi=150, bbox_inches="tight") ``` :::
